languages.text: {n}Даже когда разум ваш захлестывают чуждые видения, вы сохраняете достаточную твердость, чтобы анализировать получаемую информацию. Вы ясно понимаете суть пагубной "порчи" — коварные сбои, транслируемые кем-то могучим извне и вторгающиеся в процесс пробуждения ксеносов от стазис-сна. Они ввергают нелюдей в состояние, близкое к человеческому пониманию безумия.{/n}

{n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже когда разум ваш захлестывают чуждые видения, вы сохраняете достаточную твердость, чтобы анализировать получаемую информацию. Вы ясно понимаете суть пагубной "порчи" — коварные сбои, транслируемые кем-то могучим извне и вторгающиеся в процесс пробуждения ксеносов от стазис-сна. Они ввергают нелюдей в состояние, близкое к человеческому пониманию безумия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Even while being flooded by xenos visions, your mind remains robust enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you're clear about the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious errors that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. The notion of madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

{n}Even while being flooded by xenos visions, your mind remains robust enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you're clear about the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious errors that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. The notion of madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

{n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incluso cuando te invaden las visiones xenos, tu mente conserva suficiente claridad para analizar la información que recibe. Ahora comprendes la naturaleza de este vil «Maleficio». Un ser poderoso emite una interferencia espantosa que impide que los xenos despierten de su suspensión. El concepto más similar del lenguaje humano al efecto que esta situación tiene sobre ellos sería la locura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incluso cuando te invaden las visiones xenos, tu mente conserva suficiente claridad para analizar la información que recibe. Ahora comprendes la naturaleza de este vil «Maleficio». Un ser poderoso emite una interferencia espantosa que impide que los xenos despierten de su suspensión. El concepto más similar del lenguaje humano al efecto que esta situación tiene sobre ellos sería la locura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors même que votre esprit est assailli par des visions xénos, il reste suffisamment lucide pour analyser les informations qui lui parviennent. Vous comprenez maintenant la nature du pernicieux « Maléfice ». À l'extérieur, quelqu'un de puissant diffuse d'insidieuses interférences qui perturbent les xénos sortant de leur stase. La folie est le plus proche équivalent humain de l'effet que cela a sur eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors même que votre esprit est assailli par des visions xénos, il reste suffisamment lucide pour analyser les informations qui lui parviennent. Vous comprenez maintenant la nature du pernicieux « maléfice ». À l'extérieur, quelqu'un de puissant diffuse d'insidieuses interférences qui perturbent les xénos sortant de leur stase. La notion de folie est le plus proche équivalent humain de l'effet que cela a sur eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族のビジョンに囚われている間も、意識は入ってくる情報を分析できるほどにはっきりしていた。やっと有害な「悪行」の本質について理解した。外にいる強力な何者かが、密かに異種族が休眠から目覚めるのを妨害している。これは異種族に対し、人間における狂気に近い作用を及ぼしているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族のビジョンに囚われている間も、意識は入ってくる情報を分析できるほどにはっきりしていた。やっと有害な「悪行」の本質について理解した。外にいる強力な何者かが、密かに異種族が休眠から目覚めるのを妨害している。これは異種族に対し、人間における狂気に近い作用を及ぼしているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}即便你被异形的幻象吞没，你的头脑依然保持清醒，能够冷静分析你接受到的信息。如今，你已经理解了所谓“恶意”的本质，是某个强大的存在释放了某种邪恶的干扰信号，让这些异形无法从静滞中正常苏醒。对这些异形而言，这样的影响最接近于人类“疯狂”的概念。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即便你被异形的幻象吞没，你的头脑依然保持清醒，能够冷静分析你接受到的信息。如今，你已经理解了所谓“恶意”的本质，是某个强大的存在释放了某种邪恶的干扰信号，让这些异形无法从静滞中正常苏醒。对这些异形而言，这样的影响最接近于人类“疯狂”的概念。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Obwohl dein Verstand von Xenos-Visionen geflutet wird, bleibt er stabil genug, um die eingehenden Informationen zu verarbeiten. Du verstehst nun das Wesen der heimtückischen "Bosheit". Jemand Mächtiges von außen überträgt heimtückische Interferenzen, die das Erwachen der Xenos aus ihrem Stasis-Schlaf stören. Die Auswirkungen, die das auf die Xenos hat, lassen sich am ehesten mit dem menschlichen Konzept des Wahnsinns vergleichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Obwohl dein Verstand von Xenos-Visionen geflutet wird, bleibt er stabil genug, um die eingehenden Informationen zu verarbeiten. Du verstehst nun das Wesen der heimtückischen "Bosheit". Jemand Mächtiges von außen überträgt heimtückische Interferenzen, die das Erwachen der Xenos aus ihrem Stasis-Schlaf stören. Die Auswirkungen, die das auf die Xenos hat, lassen sich am ehesten mit dem menschlichen Konzept des Wahnsinns vergleichen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zeno görülerinin hücumuna uğramış bile olsa zihnin, gelen bilgileri analiz edecek kadar sağlıklı kalıyor. Bu tehlikeli "Kötücüllük" nedir artık kavrıyorsun. Dışarıdan çok güçlü birisi, zenoların staz uykusundan uyanışlarını aksatan, sinsi bir müdahale yayını gönderiyor. Bu müdahalenin onlardaki etkisine benzeyen en insansı şey ise delilik oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even while being flooded with xenos visions, your mind remains sound enough to analyse the incoming information. Now you grasp the nature of the pernicious "Malefice." Someone powerful on the outside is broadcasting insidious interferences that disrupt the xenos' awakening from their stasis sleep. Madness is the nearest human equivalent of the effect this has on them.{/n}
